title: Allegheny Portage Railroad National Historic Site: Calendar
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar            Calendar           Keyword       By Date     Start Date      End Date          Search         Upcoming Events    Showing 7 results    Show ALL instances of recurring events   RSS Feed      Allegheny Portage Railroad National Historic Site Daily Summer Programs      Time: 10:00 AM to 12:00 PM,2:00 PM to 4:00 PM Location: Allegheny Portage Railroad National Historic Site Fees: Park Fees Apply     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Everyday  from 06/04/2016 to 09/25/2016 Daily summer programs at Allegheny Portage Railroad National Historic Site View Details      Allegheny Portage Railroad National Historic Site Allegheny Portage Railroad Van Tour      Time: 1:00 PM Location: Allegheny Portage Railroad National Historic Site Fees: Free! View Details      Allegheny Portage Railroad National Historic Site Evening on the Summit: Enjoying the Night Sky      Time: 8:00 PM Location: Summit Level Visitor Center, Allegheny Portage Railroad National Historic Site Fees: Free!     Saturday, September 3, 2016 Dr. Martin Rice will highlight how to locate and identify constellations and otehr features of the night sky. View Details             To find out what events are going on in the park during your visit, simply enter the date range into the search feature.      Click to find out about our 2016 Schedule of Events. Please note, that this includes events for both Allegheny Portage Railroad National Historic Site and Johnstown Flood National Memorial.
